title: Garden-style 1337 SqFt 2 BR / 2.5 BA in Stone Mountain. Visit us today!
posting_body: ['The Park At East Ponce', 'Located at: 1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2.5 bath | 1337 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1606/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by The Park at East Ponce Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '◾ Accepts Credit Card Payments', '◾ Accepts Electronic Payments', '◾ Community Events', '◾ Gated Community', '◾ Online Leasing', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Pet Friendly', '◾ Storage', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ Cardio & Fitness Center', '◾ Electronic Rent Payment', '◾ Fax/Copy Services', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾', 'On-Site Management', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Resident Referral Bonuses', '◾ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '◾', 'Some Architectural Distinction', '◾ Three Clothes Care Centers', 'Apartment Features!', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Cozy Fireplaces', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Extra Storage', '◾ Island Kitchens', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Range w/Oven', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Custom Cabinetry', '◾ Hardwood Flooring', '◾ Individual Climate Control', '◾ Newly Renovated Apartments', '◾ Roommate Floor Plans', '◾ Townhomes Available', '◾ Trash Compactor', '◾ Washer & Dryer Connections', '◾ Window Coverings', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '9D79989F6AE44A7']
